connectionTimeout: Connection timeout. Please check your internet connection.
sendTimeout: Sending the request took too long. Check your internet connection.
receiveTimeout: The server took too long to respond. Try again later.
badResponse: Error in server response. Try again later.
cancel: The request was canceled. Please try again.
unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
socketException: It seems you are not connected to the internet. Please check your connection.
unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
badResponse_400: Bad request. Please check the inputs.
badResponse_401: Unauthorized. Please check your login details.
badResponse_500: Server error. Please try again later.
badResponse_503: Service unavailable. Please try again later.
error: Please try again later or contact support
airline_booking_description: Create an online system that provides options for booking flights, hotels, and resorts, along with direct access to flight and accommodation information.
xml_api_systems_description: Integrate your website with high-quality XML / API systems, connecting it directly to hotel and airline systems worldwide.
app_development_description: Offer travel services such as flight and hotel bookings through mobile devices for your customers and link them to your website.
travel_solutions: Travel solutions with us put you in the competition
travel_features: Modern technology for travel and tourism trips.
Direct connection with suppliers of airline, hotel, and travel services.
Expanding your company's reach to anywhere in the world.
High-quality services provided by a team of programmers and specialists.
Design your website in a unique and modern way.
products_list: White Label Services with Your Branding
onboarding_page_1_description: The best travel and tourism solutions in one place, helping you book flights and hotels easily and professionally.
onboarding_page_2_description: Our system offers direct integration with XML / API services and Global Distribution Systems (GDS) to provide accurate and fast services.
onboarding_page_3_description: With Wow Information Technology, you can offer travel services in a sophisticated manner to your customers and reach a global audience.
service1_description: Create an online system offering flight and hotel booking options.
service2_description: Connect the website to high-quality XML / API systems.
service3_description: We offer online travel services linked with flight booking systems.
service4_description: Providing flight and hotel booking services through mobile apps.
app_development_details: Mobile app marketing is a crucial necessity for the success of your company and for reaching hundreds of millions of smartphone users daily. It is the near future that combines all forms of marketing for services in various fields.
app_development_details_description: With extensive experience in developing travel apps for mobile devices, we create your own app and link it to your website. We measure the service needs of your customers and make them accessible via mobile, turning your idea into a reality that can interact with millions of travel and tourism enthusiasts and generate instant profits.
app_development_feature_1: Various systems for communication with companies, individuals, or internal systems for employees.
app_development_feature_2: Wide options for internal and external control systems.
app_development_feature_3: Create a modern work system and develop an internal communication system for the company.
app_development_feature_4: Various online electronic payment methods according to your choice.
app_development_feature_5: Online booking systems for tourism services (flights, hotels, car rentals, cruises).
app_development_feature_6: A system that allows you to create and display your own travel offers.
app_development_benefit_2: A wide base of flight, hotel, and trip data.
app_development_benefit_4: Display updates on available locations and offers directly.
website_development_description: The success of website elements is one of the most important reasons for your company's success. Therefore, we offer you a complete site with respect to the interface design, fast browsing, backend programming, client database, and connecting your site with internal users in your company. A complete professional site provided by a team of experienced and talented specialists, with support for solving technical issues during the integration of your site with user data.

cruise_system_description: Provide your customers with an online search and booking engine for cruise trips through your website, and allow them to book sea trips online. We offer direct communication with cruise service and data providers, including travel agents and companies, live and in real-time.
cruise_feature_2: Real-time prices and timings for cruise trips

white_label_system_description: We enable direct communication with your customers via a white label platform, designed according to your specific preferences on your website. It provides you with an advanced search engine service linked to the database of all your tourism services, allowing you to communicate with customers, identify their needs through the search engine, and offer white label services. Easily and quickly sell hotel bookings, flights, travel trips, and vacations.

gds_system_description: Choose the most suitable automated tourism service booking system and create a wide service booking network connected to major airlines around the world through your website, such as available seats for airlines, hotel rooms, car rentals, and other travel services from travel agents and major global companies offering distribution systems like Amadeus, Galileo, Sabre, and Worldspan.

electronic_travel_description: In the midst of technological development using billions of internet and mobile app users, travel companies and agencies seek to develop electronic travel solutions in innovative and effective ways that help them succeed and reach customers interested in tourism and travel around the world. We offer you various electronic travel solutions by a team of specialists in the field of electronic travel and tourism, to design travel and tourism websites and connect them to a number of modern online tourism search engines for hotels, flights, XML, GDS, LCC, API, Car Rental API. You can aggregate tourism services, flight systems, and hotel data through your website and connect your services to companies and customers.
